changeSet.author: Angel Montenegro
changeSet.sql: CREATE TEMP TABLE profiles_to_reindex AS (SELECT orcid FROM address where source_id is null and client_source_id is null) order by orcid;

UPDATE address a SET source_id = (SELECT source_id FROM profile b where a.orcid = b.orcid), client_source_id = (SELECT client_source_id FROM profile b where a.orcid = b.orcid) WHERE a.source_id is null and a.client_source_id is null
UPDATE address SET source_id=orcid WHERE source_id is null and client_source_id is null
UPDATE profile SET last_modified=now(), indexing_status='REINDEX' WHERE orcid in (SELECT orcid FROM profiles_to_reindex);
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS profiles_to_reindex;
